channel.title: New auto restarter/compiler doesn't use batch files!
channel.description:
Well I've seen that many people use batch files to run and compile their servers. To be honest they aren't that good. When somebody SYI's or spams your server you sometimes lagg pretty bad. What I use is called Server Runtime Manager. It's a compiler and runner in one exe file. smile.gif It also makes banning spammers or nullers much easier. Reason being is when you click stop it shuts off the server but everything in the black box stays there.
Here is a pic of how it looks. (It's pretty easy to use)
[img]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll45/spino59/serverrun.jpg[/img]
need some1 to do a screen shot of it and upload for me so people know it's not a virus. thanks if you post.
When you enter in the info it saves it as a txt file called ServerToolsSettings.
Download link - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=YO0HZIRH
Thanks! credits
10% to me help coding it and posting. 90% to meiscoldude
